name: altspace-gltf-guide
description: This guide will walk you through the [glTF](https://github.com/KhronosGroup/glTF) asset creation pipeline, starting from model creation in [Blender](https://www.blender.org/), through export, conversion, and finally import into [AltspaceVR](https://altvr.com) via [Three.js](http://threejs.org/). This guide was written for the following software versions: Blender 2.77a, collada2gltf@d78daf1, and glTFLoader from Three.js r78.
